Skills

My programming skills are deeply rooted in object-oriented coding. My go-to languages are Python and MATLAB, version controlled with git, of course. That being said, I will always try and use the best tool for the job at hand. I am exploring C++ and SQL!

Professional Experience

Algorithm Designer

2019 - present

L3Harris WESCAM, Hamilton, ON

  • The lead algorithm designer for the novel infrared-based imaging system.
  • Simulating synthetic data of land-based and maritime scenes.
  • Developing software for multi-target detection and tracking.
  • Leading the effort in migrating the machine learning stack to Microsoft Azure.

Research Assistant

2012 - 2019

McMaster University, Hamilton, ON & Dalhousie University, Halifax, NS

  • Developed spectral line fitting algorithms, modelled galaxy's dynamics, and used statistical analysis to uncover distant galaxies.
  • Designed algorithms to align obscured star maps to unprecedented accuracy to measure small changes in a star's luminosity.
    • Python / Starlink / CASA / LaTeX / Linux

Resident Scientist

2016

East Asian Observatory, Hilo, HI

  • Assisted in commissioning of an instrument on the James Clerk Maxwell Telescope (JCMT)
  • Conducted >450 hrs of scientific observations with the JCMT's legacy and prototype instruments
    • Python / Bash / Starlink / Linux
